Mid-Senior level

job_description:
Must Haves

5-7 years of experience in the following:
Experience with providing leadership, guidance and support services to the project team and business subject matter experts related to the creation and management of all project-related RIM research, analysis, artifacts, documentation and plans, as well as facilitation of project tasks
Demonstrated experience working within a broader project, establishing scope and timelines to align with the management objectives.
Demonstrated experience in conducting validation sessions, getting review, approvals/ authorization from management and other stakeholders, accommodating busy stakeholder schedules.
Demonstrated experience providing recommendations for records management, access and holds for database systems and assessing IT solutions for records and information management implications.
Experience with digital system features such as information logging, metadata, access controls, system integration/data sharing and archiving.
Working knowledge of digital information life cycle including online business processes, workflow, inputs and outputs of systems from a recordkeeping perspective
